data.name: Desktop Dinosaurs
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy watching cute hand animated dinosaurs inspired by 90's Tamagotchi live directly on your desktop. Manage your environment, resources to raise and evolve your dinosaurs during their entire life. But don't forget to show them love! Dinosaurs need love!

Features ðŸ¦•

  • Watch â€‹your dinosaurs live (eat, sleep, die...)
  • 2 game modes:
    • Overlay: play directly on your windows desktop (available only on Windows)
    • Fullscreen: play with an animated background, dynamics lighning reflecting the current time of the day.

  • 3 species of dinosaurs currently available : Stegosaur, Triceratops, Tyranosaur (more to come)
  • Your progression is saved
  • Name your dinosaurs
  • Randomly generated dinosaur colors amoung 27 color sets
  • A shop where you can buy new dinosaurs eggs, food, decorations

data.short_description: Enjoy watching cute hand animated dinosaurs inspired by 90's Tamagotchi live directly on your desktop. Manage your environment, resources to raise and evolve your dinosaurs during their entire life. But don't forget to show them love! Dinosaurs need love!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8
  • Processor: Core i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Mavericks
  • Processor: Core i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c+
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Core i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
